## Validation Checklist

- [ ] `bun run validate` passes
- [ ] `bun run build` passes
- [ ] `bun test` passes
- [ ] `registryDependencies` are correct for any cross-component imports
- [ ] Changelog entry added (new version, today's date, correct type)
- [ ] Built `r/` output is committed
- [ ] Imports use `@kitn/<type>/<file>.js` for cross-component references
